By exhaling the [[Kotarō]] that their bodies are able to produce, members of the [[Kodon clan]] hypnotise [[Rōen]], putting it under their control. Most forms of attack that might be directed against Rōen won't disrupt the hypnotism, but large quantities of [[blue fire powder]] will. The jutsu can also be used on those that Rōen has been [[Sealing Technique: Rōen Kodon|sealed into]], dulling its influence over them and altering their memories if desired. If anyone else inhales the purple smoke, they will simply lose consciousness.
